Initializer# init(identifier:conversationIdentifier:content:dateSent:sender:recipients:groupName:serviceName:messageType:numberOfAttachments:)

iOS 17.0+iPadOS 17.0+Mac Catalyst 17.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 10.0+

```
convenience init(
    identifier: String,
    conversationIdentifier: String?,
    content: String?,
    dateSent: Date?,
    sender: INPerson?,
    recipients: [INPerson]?,
    groupName: INSpeakableString?,
    serviceName: String?,
    messageType: INMessageType,
    numberOfAttachments: NSNumber?
)
```
